statements: UPDATE website_traffic_reports SET page_views = 1000, unique_visitors = 500, conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE website_id = 1
UPDATE website_traffic_reports SET conversion_rate = 0.07, page_views = 1500 WHERE website_id = 2
UPDATE website_traffic_reports SET page_views = 1500, unique_visitors = 800 WHERE website_id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic_reports SET conversion_rate = 0.075, page_views = 2000 WHERE website_id = 2;
UPDATE website_traffic SET visitor_id = 123 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_rate = 7.89 WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE website_traffic SET visitor_id = 1001, page_visited = 'Home' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET page_conversion = 'Buy Now', conversion_rate = 3.75 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE website_traffic SET referral_source = 'Google Ads' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_type = 'Purchase' WHERE visitor_id = 123;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_url = 'www.example.com/new-page' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET conversion_type = 'purchase' WHERE visitor_id = 100 AND conversion_event > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE WebsiteVisits SET conversion_status = TRUE WHERE visit_id = 101;
UPDATE TrafficSources SET daily_visits_count = 500, conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE source_id = 201;
UPDATE WebsiteVisits SET conversion_status = TRUE, page_visited = 'Homepage' WHERE visit_id = 12345;
UPDATE TrafficSources SET daily_visits_count = daily_visits_count + 100, conversion_rate = 0.05 WHERE source_name = 'Organic Search';
UPDATE website_traffic SET visitor_id = 1001 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE performance_analysis SET avg_load_time = 3.45, bounce_rate = 0.25 WHERE page_url = '/homepage';
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_url='http://example.com/page1', visitor_id=1234 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE conversion_rates SET converted=TRUE, conversion_timestamp='2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE id=2;
